author: snanners
title: Amazing service and very nice traditional hotel
text:
We really enjoyed our stay at the hotel, the staff were very very helpful and have very good English. They went out of their way to ensure we had a good stay with them and helped with all questions we had. The hotel itself is really nice and traditional with good amenities. We had a room for 3 people and it was very spacious with a private balcony also.
There is a lot of choice for breakfast, mainly Chinese choices but also western choices such as croissants, cereals etc.
Overall a very pleasant stay with very helpful and friendly staff.
